name: Smug.le
description:
Other idles games not as good as me huh? ufufufu :3

Upgrade your "original" anime girls to progress further and further into number euphoria. Unlock 9 characters with unique materials and upgrades to unlock. Make yourself wait in the most fun ways possible!

This will most likely be my last 2d game in unity as I'm currently learning Godot and plan on using it for my 2d projects in the future. Also at the moment, I'm moving houses temporarily and the only access to internet I have is through my phones hotspot. It was very hard to upload this game :|

Feedback is appreciated!
